Sa-Lrp TF (Lrp/AsnC family transcriptional regulator), glutamine is a cofactor (tetramer in apo form, octomer in holo form)

Expression is threefold lower in WT vs del strain in stat phase
Expression is 3.5x lower in WT than in del strain when L-glutamine is only Nitrogen source
Expression is twofold higher in WT than in del strain with no UV induction (drops a bit after UV induction)
Expression is twofold higher in WT than in del strain with no UV induction, eightfold higher in WT than in del strain with UV induction
Expression is twofold lower in WT than in del strain, regardless of UV induction
Expression is twofold lower in WT than in del strain, regardless of UV induction
